text.div:
SHR AllergyVerificationStatusVS ValueSet

Whether the allergy has been verified or not. Intentionally a subset of the codes in FHIR, since refuted would be reflected by correcting the 'elevated risk' element, and records entered in error are not included in SHR.

name: SHR AllergyVerificationStatusVS ValueSet
title: SHR AllergyVerificationStatusVS ValueSet
publisher: The MITRE Corporation: Standard Health Record Collaborative
description: Whether the allergy has been verified or not. Intentionally a subset of the codes in FHIR, since refuted would be reflected by correcting the 'elevated risk' element, and records entered in error are not included in SHR.
